name: 混乱使者
description: "Chaos Maker" is a single-machine game of Cooperative combat and Multiplayer confrontation with animation style. It supports many people online. It supports local four-player games. Players can choose to participate in story mode or confrontation mode, cooperate with other players or confront them.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: win7 64位 Processor: i3 650 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GTX660 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: win10 64位 Processor: i5 4690 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1060 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 250 MB available space
